# torscrape

<!-- badges: start -->
[![R-CMD-check](https://github.com/fangzhou-xie/torscrape/workflows/R-CMD-check/badge.svg)](https://github.com/fangzhou-xie/torscrape/actions)
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of torscrape is to provide a simple function for web scraping with Tor proxies.

## Installation

You can install the development version of torscrape from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("fangzhou-xie/torscrape")
```
